subject: Question about my pedals
description_text:
Hi I have plus pedals not plus x and I see that you can change the kg in
the software, I was just wondering why mine can’t do that if that’s normal.
Or if there is a way to just kg of the pedals.  Thank you

conversations.body_text: Hi Hung Pham,  The Kg value display requires the PlusX control box hardware, as the Plus control box does not support this feature yet. You can also purchase the PlusX control box separately — it additionally supports vibration feedback and SimHub integration.      https://www.simsonn.com/products/simsonn-vam-pedals-haptic-reactor?variant=51351053533498
